project/knowledge-network/phase2e-templa.value: "{\"phase\":\"2E\",\"swarmName\":\"Template System\",\"completionTime\":\"2025-09-17T22:16:35Z\",\"qualityScore\":8.7,\"deliverables\":{\"engine\":\"src/lib/templates/engine.ts\",\"library\":\"src/lib/templates/library.ts\",\"api\":\"/api/templates, /api/templates/[id], /api/templates/render\",\"ui\":\"src/components/templates/*, /templates, /templates/new\",\"editor\":\"toolbar plugin + registerTemplateEditorPlugin()\",\"docs\":\"docs/templates/*\"},\"integration\":{\"editor\":true,\"collaboration\":true,\"organization\":\"context-ready\",\"search\":\"unchanged\"},\"nextSteps\":[\"pass org/user context to render\",\"RBAC checks on visibility\",\"version diff/rollback UI\",\"marketplace manifest & publish flow\"]}"
